com.unvired.security
Class PasscodeGenerator

java.lang.Object
  com.unvired.security.PasscodeGenerator

public class PasscodeGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

An implementation of the HOTP generator specified by RFC 4226. Generates short passcodes that may be used in challenge-response protocols or as timeout passcodes that are only valid for a short period. The default passcode is a 6-digit decimal code and the default timeout period is 5 minutes.

verifyTimeoutCode

public boolean verifyTimeoutCode(java.lang.String timeoutCode)
                          throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException
Verify a timeout code. The timeout code will be valid for a time determined by the interval period and the number of adjacent intervals checked.

Parameters:
timeoutCode - The timeout code
Returns:
True if the timeout code is valid
Throws:
java.security.GeneralSecurityException
